name: Unicorn Mazer
description:
Unicorn Mazer is an Old-School Maze  Game, with Cupcakes, Coffee and  Evil Bulls.

Just Download, Install the Game and Have Fun!

The Game is a Personal Project, Free to Play, Accepting Donations. 
Unicorn Mazer was Made with Python without any Game Engine. 

Any Suggestion, Leave a Comment! 

Thanks for Playing!
